docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Achievements

Achievement system tracking kills (zombies, players, NPCs), item pickups, playtime, deaths, and multi-objective challenges with rewards

Animations

Roleplay animations (/act commands) including surrender, salute, cross arms, attention, typing poses, and combat stances that interrupt on movement

Armor

Adds Funny Armors

Banking

Full banking system with multiple accounts, deposits/withdrawals, transfers, item storage, check writing/redemption, ATMs, and paycheck integration

Black Market NPC

Provides features such as Sells illegal weapons and contraband, Limited stock with restock timers, Requires players to find secret location, Prices configurable via script, and Great for underground roleplay.

Cameras

Security camera and CCTV monitor system for surveillance with faction-restricted access and live feed viewing

Car Bomb

Terrorism mechanics with vehicle car bombs (engine-activated) and door explosives, both with timed detonation, remote detonation, and debris creation

Car Dealer

Provides features such as Purchase vehicles from a dealer NPC, Return or repair owned vehicles for a fee, Custom paint jobs and bodygroup modifications with configurable price, Garages store vehicles safely, and Integrates with driving addons.

Car Options

Vehicle quality of life features including CD player system with music tracks, albums, and audio streaming for in-car entertainment

Car Spawner

Module for spawning themed cars for players.

Chess and Droughts

Interactive chess and checkers (draughts) board games with multiplayer support, wagering system, and leaderboard tracking

Clearance Levels

Adds clearance level system to doors

Clothing System

Bonemerging System for Clothing and Outfits.

Corpses & Looting

Corpse looting system allowing players to search dead bodies, transfer items and money, with configurable search distance and anti-spam protection

Crafting

Recipe-based crafting system with crafting stations (forge, workbench), time-based progress, attribute requirements, tool dependencies, and faction restrictions

Daily Rewards

Daily rewards system with 20 objectives (walking, chatting, playtime, money, interactions, jobs, building, vehicles, arrests, healing, property, lockpicking, paychecks, ads, emergencies, XP, voting, crimes, spending, sprinting) and escalating streak bonuses at 14/30/60/90 days.

Data Disks

Adds memory disk entities (64C-1024C) for terminal/decoder interactions.

Data Disks

Adds memory disk entities (64C-1024C) for terminal/decoder interactions.

Death Trooper Scrambler

Communication scrambler system for Death Trooper faction allowing private, encrypted voice communications with sound effects for non-authorized listeners

Delivery NPC

Provides features such as Offers parcel delivery side jobs, Random drop-off locations per mission, Pays players money on completion, NPC shows delivery progress via dialog, and Encourages exploration of the map.

Drugs

Drug cultivation, processing, consumption, and addiction system with effects like speed boost, damage reduction, and stamina regeneration

Dynamic Food

Restaurant cooking system with cooking machines, customer orders, ingredient fridges, worktables, dish preparation, and hunger restoration mechanics

Events

Map-based NPC event system with configurable spawn positions, player count requirements, automatic timers, and staff/player notifications

Extraction

Raid-style extraction system requiring players to reach escape zones within countdown timer, with configurable positions per map and audio/visual cues

Faction PK

Allows faction leaders to perform PKs on their members.

Fence NPC

Provides features such as Buy stolen items from players, Pay based on item reward values, Support for all robbery items, and Secure transaction system.

FOB Respawn Points

Forward operating base terminals that manage faction access and respawn locations.

Gathering System

Resource gathering from trees (spruce, sticks, sap) and rocks (iron/gold/silver ore, coal), fishing system with pole/bait and fish types (trout, bass, catfish, perch) plus junk, crafting materials (ingots, wood, swords), and stackable inventory management.

Help NPCs

Provides features such as Provides information to new players, Can give basic starter items, Dialog tree explains server mechanics, Directs players to other NPC services, and Simple friendly conversation.

ID System

ID card system allowing players to show/request/force view IDs with multiple designs (California, German, New York, Southside, Yorkshire) and character recognition mechanics.

Improved Constructable Props

Constructable prop system with furniture items (boxes, cabinets, chairs, tables, couches) requiring resources and supporting upgrades into functional entities

Injuries System

Adds indepth damage to legs with side effects

Leveling

Character leveling system with XP, skill points, and skill tree (Endurance: +25 health, Combat Training: +15% damage, Engineering: +15% tool effectiveness/+30% repair speed) with dependencies, F1 menu integration, and admin adjustment tools.

Limb Damage

Limb damage system where leg shots cause configurable sprint delay with automatic healing and toggleable enable/disable functionality

Lootables

Searchable loot containers (cardboard boxes, wooden crates, metal barrels, lockers, safes) with rarity tiers (Common/Uncommon/Rare/Legendary/Unique), skill requirements (strength/luck), alarm systems, and cooldown timers for exploration-based item gathering.

LSCS Compatibility

Adds compatibility with LSCS (Lightsaber Combat System) for enhanced lightsaber combat mechanics.

Marketplace

Provides features such as Marketplace system for player-to-player trading, Buy and sell items with no expiration dates, Configurable listing limits and minimum prices, NPC vendor interface for easy access, Search and filter functionality for items, Economic system integration for server economy, and Super admin item removal tools.

Medals

Persistent medal award system displayed on character profiles with staff permissions for giving/taking medals and admin controls

Medical Kit

Adds a configurable medkit SWEP for healing yourself or others with cooldowns.

Mobile Phones

Mobile phone system with unique phone numbers, voice calling, text messaging, and contact management for player communication

Police Suite

Comprehensive police system with stun weapons, crime tracking, warrants, arrests, police NPCs, and computer database for law enforcement management.

Radio Voice Chat

Handheld radio voice chat system with frequency tuning, encrypted channels, faction access, static radios, and range-based communication

Ranking

Ranking system for the gamemode

Realtor

Property creation and management system with tool-based door selection.

Recruiter NPC

Provides a Recruiter NPC that allows players to join or resign from a list of configured jobs. Features dynamic dialog options based on player

Referrals

Player referral system allowing players to refer others and earn monetary rewards when referred players join, with configurable reward amounts and admin management tools.

Store Robbery

Store robbery system with jewelry cases and cash registers, stealable items (cash, jewelry, watches, rings), police requirements, and respawn timers

Taxi NPC

Provides features such as Spawns taxi vehicles for hire, NPC teleports you to preset locations, Charges fee based on distance, Checks if player already owns a taxi, and Uses workshop vehicle models.

Territories

Faction control point system with configurable capture zones, NPC defenders, HUD status display, and rewards for holding territories

Tying

Provides features such as Rope items can restrain other players, Bound players cannot use weapons, Supports dragging with submodules, Blindfold and gag features available, and Encourages hostage scenarios.

docs.title: Armor
docs.text: Adds Funny Armors

docs.title: Generator
docs.text: Armor Generator Mod Generator Unique ID: Unique identifier for this armor (no spaces, lowercase) Armor Name: Description: Standard combat armor worn by Combine soldiers Icon Model: Shown in inventory (also defaults item model) Player Model: Applied to player when equipped (optional) Resistance: 0-100 damage resistance Speed Boost: Negative slows, positive speeds up Jump Boost:  Takes Fall Damage               Power Armor              Overlay: Leave empty for none Footstep Sound: Leave empty for nil Supported Mods: fortified, wardbound, swift, temper Comma-separated mod types (not uniqueIDs). Example: swift, regen Generate Armor Code Generate Example Unique ID: Unique identifier for this mod item Mod Type: This must match armor "supportedMods" entries Mod Name: Description: Increases physical damage resistance. Effect Description: Model: Physical Resist: Magic Resist: Regen: Speed: Damage: Generate Mod Code Generate Example Generated Code

docs.title: Generator
docs.text: Unique ID: Unique identifier for this item (no spaces, lowercase) Display Name: Description: An unregistered firearm commonly sold on the blackmarket. Buyer assumes all responsibility. Base Price: Default price in dollars Cooldown (seconds): Individual item cooldown Max Quantity: 0 = unlimited Category: Category for organization  Use Faction Restrictions          Limit which factions can purchase this item Restriction Type: Whitelist (Only allowed factions) Faction-Specific Pricing Allowed Factions: FACTION_CITIZEN, FACTION_GANG Comma-separated faction constants Faction Pricing: FACTION_CITIZEN = 500, FACTION_GANG = 300 Format: FACTION_NAME = price (one per line) Generate Blackmarket Code Generate Example Generated Code

Perfect for those who demand the best in speed and style. Vehicle Model: 3D model path for the vehicle Price: Purchase price in currency Class: Economy Compact Mid-size Sports Luxury SUV Truck Van Vehicle classification Fuel Capacity: Maximum fuel capacity Max Speed: Maximum speed (km/h) Health: Vehicle health points Seats: Number of passenger seats Storage: Storage capacity Generate Vehicle Item Code Generate Example Generated Code

Price: Spawn Distance: Optional (defaults to 200) Spawn Height: Optional (defaults to 12) Hull Mins: Used for space check (optional) Hull Maxs: Used for space check (optional) Generate Car Spawner Code Generate Example Generated Code

docs.title: Crafting
docs.text: Recipe-based crafting system with crafting stations (forge, workbench), time-based progress, attribute requirements, tool dependencies, and faction restrictions

docs.title: Generator
docs.text: Station Generator Recipe Generator Station ID: Used as the station key and to generate entity class lia_craftingstation_<id> Station Name: Model: Generate Station Code Generate Example Station ID: Recipe ID: Recipe Name: Craft Time: Requires Knowledge: false true Crafting Reward: Faction (optional): Requirements: Item uniqueID and amount. Add Requirement Output: Amount can be a number (1) or range ({2, 4}). Add Output Tools (optional): Comma-separated list of tool item uniqueIDs. Attributes (optional): Format: attrib=minimum,attrib2=minimum Generate Recipe Code Generate Example Generated Code

Model: 3D model path for the food item Hunger: Hunger restored (0-100) Thirst: Thirst restored (0-100) Width: Inventory width Height: Inventory height Category: Item category in inventory Generate Food Item Code Generate Example Generated Code

docs.title: Gathering System
docs.text: Resource gathering from trees (spruce, sticks, sap) and rocks (iron/gold/silver ore, coal), fishing system with pole/bait and fish types (trout, bass, catfish, perch) plus junk, crafting materials (ingots, wood, swords), and stackable inventory management.

docs.title: Generator
docs.text: Entity Class: Unique identifier for this gatherable entity (no spaces, lowercase) Display Name: Description: A rich vein of iron ore embedded in the rock face. Model Path: Hit Sound: Sound played when entity is hit (leave empty for default) Health: How many hits the entity can take Items Before Cooldown: How many items can be gathered before cooldown Cooldown Time (seconds): Cooldown duration in seconds Valid Weapons: lia_pickaxe Comma-separated weapon classes that can gather this entity Loot Table: iron_ore:2-4:85, stone:1-2:60, coal:0-1:25 Format: item_id:min-max:chance (comma-separated). Example: iron_ore:2-4:85 Generate Gathering Code Generate Example Generated Code

docs.title: Improved Constructable Props

docs.title: Generator
docs.text: Prop Generator Item Generator Unique ID: Unique identifier for this prop (no spaces, lowercase) Prop Name: Description: A simple wooden chair for sitting. Prop Model: Model placed in the world when constructed Inventory Model (Optional): Model shown in inventory (leave empty for default: item_item_crate.mdl) Inventory Width: Inventory grid width (defaults to 2) Inventory Height: Inventory grid height (defaults to 2) Health: Optional health value (0 for indestructible) Category: Item category (defaults to "Constructable") Construction Time: Construction time in seconds (defaults to 5) Generate Prop Code Generate Example Unique ID: Unique identifier for this item Item Name: Description: A custom construction item. Item Model: Model shown in inventory Prop Model: Model placed when constructed Inventory Width: Inventory Height: Construction Time: Construction time in seconds Prop Health: Health of the placed prop (optional) Generate Item Code Generate Example Generated Code

Add Stealable Item Generate Location Code Generate Example Item Unique ID: Name: Description: A bag containing valuable jewelry. Model: Width: Height: Reward Min: Reward Max: Generate Item Code Generate Example Generated Code
